config.potionbundles.returnString: Whether to return the string upon finishing the bundle or not.
config.potionbundles.durabilityBarColor: What color the damage bar of a potion bundle should have. Set to -1 to not display a damage bar.
config.potionbundles.allowSplashPotion: Allow the creation of Potion Bundles from Splash Potions (requires world restart).
config.potionbundles.allowLingeringPotio: Allow the creation of Potion Bundles from Lingering Potions (requires world restart).
